title: End of game gifting dont work!
body: I try to level up my account so i want to gift every guy that helps me after the game. I have lvl 15 and i still cand gift after the game. The problem is that i dont want to add so many random people and wait a day. For example if a stranger helps me, i wanna gift him and keep him motivate to play other games too. Why it does not work?!

replies.body: Are you on the updated client?  Were you able to previously gift on the legacy version?  The updated client is still in testing, so that feature may not be totally functional yet.  Let me know if that's the case for you.
the feature doesnt work on eune too. Tried to gift a teammate and when i hover over the icon it said that this is unavailable
I have tried on the both versions of clients

Are you otherwise able to make other purchases in the store with RP?  I'm a bit confused, I'm not sure if you're reporting an issue with the feature itself or an error trying to make a gifting purchase.  Let me know.
Well. I might be switching to EUNE ._.
